attributes.action: Ban the use of gadolinium contrast agents in our hospitals!
attributes.additional_details: I have been injured by extravasation at a London hospital after the administraiton of a gadolinum contrast agent, Dotarem, for which I am now suffering terribly and no UK doctors is able to help me. In view of the terrbile consequence the use of this product has on people's health and in view of its high costs, I urge the government to ban it completely from UK hospitals. It is bomb ready to explode with serious consequence in view of the high toxicity of this metal which is not properly used and can dissociate easily from its ligand.
